```{r}
library(psych)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
the_n     <- 1000
the_items <- 16
dat       <- expand.grid(id   = 1:the_n,
                         item = 1:the_items)
```


```{r}
latent <- tibble(id   = 1:the_n,
                 easy = rbinom(the_n, 1, 0.5))
```


```{r}
cor_items <- 8
```


```{r}
dat <- dat %>%
  full_join(latent) %>%
  mutate(
    resp = I(item <= cor_items) * easy * rbinom(nrow(dat), 1, 0.99) +
           I(item > cor_items)  * rbinom(nrow(dat), 1, 0.5)
  )
```


```{r}
dat %>%
  group_by(item) %>%
  summarise(correct = mean(resp))
```


```{r}
wide_dat <- dat %>% pivot_wider(
  id_cols = "id",
  values_from = "resp",
  names_from = "item",
  names_prefix = "i_"
)
```


```{r}
wide_dat %>%
  select(starts_with("i_")) %>%
  cor() %>%
  (\(x) x*100) %>%
  round(0)
```


```{r}
res <- wide_dat %>%
  select(starts_with("i_")) %>%
  psych::alpha()

res$total
```
